segments.text: I see the little girl standing there, just waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, like she’s about to get the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s too young to realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her mom is right there, and she’s completely missing what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl knows her mom would be upset if she saw them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and the floor is getting wetter by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to slip and fall, and it’s going to be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s about to go wrong at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to step in and stop them before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
